adHeader: Patient tutoring for Math and Science
adDetails: Need to catch up or review for your upcoming exams? Or just need an experienced, student-focused math/science tutor? I'm a math/science teacher with years of experience teaching and tutoring high school and college students in their math and science courses. For a lot of those years, I also was involved in training new teachers as well. I am currently accepting a couple new students. I'm open to teaching any level of high school or early college math, chemistry or physics. Junior high school students also welcome. My focus is on helping you reach your academic goals by helping you learn the skills to be an independent learner as well as tackle the current material that you need to learn. I am willing to drive to meet you where it is convenient for you. Let me know if it sounds like I might be of assistance. algebra, geometry, precalculus, trigonometry, trig, calculus, calc, physics, chemistry, AP, PSAT, SAT, SAT II, ACT, AHSME, GRE, GMAT, CBEST, LSAT logic section, ....
